def left(inp):
    inp=inp[1:]+inp[0]
    return int(inp)
def right(inp):
    inp=inp[-1]+inp[:-1]
    return int(inp)  
t=int(raw_input().strip())
while t:
    t-=1
    max=0
    num=raw_input().strip()
    leng=len(num)
    if(leng==1):
        max=int(num)
    elif (leng==2):
        max=left(num)
        temp=left(str(right(num)))
        if(temp>max):
            max=temp
        temp=right(str(left(num)))
        if(temp>max):
            max=temp
    else:
        max=left(str(right(num)))
        temp=right(str(left(num)))
        if(temp>max):
            max=temp
        i=1
        temp=num
        while i<leng:
            i+=1
            temp=left(temp)
            if(temp>max):
                max=temp
            temp=str(temp)
        i=1
        temp=num
       
        while i<leng:
            i+=1
            temp=right(temp)
            if(temp>max):
                max=temp
            temp=str(temp)
    print(max)
